pull.title: test: Unify testing setups for fuzz, bench, and unit tests
pull.body:
Now that the fuzz tests can use the BasicTestingSetup [1], do the same for bench.

Also move some duplicate code to a common "test/util" module.



[1]:  fuzz: Link BasicTestingSetup (shared with unit tests) #15504

scripted-diff: Rename test_bitcoin to test/setup_common

-BEGIN VERIFY SCRIPT-
sed -i --regexp-extended -e 's/test_bitcoin\.(h|cpp)/setup_common.\1/g' $(git grep -l test_bitcoin)
git mv ./src/test/test_bitcoin.h   ./src/test/setup_common.h
git mv ./src/test/test_bitcoin.cpp ./src/test/setup_common.cpp
sed -i -e 's/BITCOIN_TEST_TEST_BITCOIN_H/BITCOIN_TEST_SETUP_COMMON_H/g' ./src/test/setup_common.h
-END VERIFY SCRIPT-

events.body:
<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->

The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers.

<!--174a7506f384e20aa4161008e828411d-->
### Conflicts
Reviewers, this pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* [#15778](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15778.html) ([wallet] Move maxtxfee from node to wallet by jnewbery)
* [#15104](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15104.html) (Tests: Add unit testing for the CompressScript function by mmachicao)
* [#15052](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/15052.html) (Tests: Contract testing for the procedure AddTimeData and related fixes by mmachicao)
* [#14430](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14430.html) (Add more property based tests for basic bitcoin data structures by Christewart)
* [#14193](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/14193.html) (validation: Add missing mempool locks by MarcoFalke)
* [#13751](https://drahtbot.github.io/bitcoin_core_issue_redirect/r/13751.html) (Utils and libraries: Drops the boost/algorithm/string/split.hpp dependency by 251Labs)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.

events.body:
ACK https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/15788/commits/faf400077d0144363c2dd24187431d958fb149a9

Reviewed changes, recompiled, ran unit tests and [benchmarks](https://github.com/jonatack/bitcoin-development/blob/master/bitcoin-benchmarks/2019-04-12-bitcoin-master-benchmarks.txt). Todo: Run fuzzing.

FWIW I haven't managed to get the fuzzing to run as per `doc/fuzzing.md` so cannot confirm or infirm that aspect for this PR. [Gist here](https://gist.github.com/jonatack/5179fd1842414147c2e691ba0e871310). It's surely something I'm doing wrong. Pointers welcome.
Fuzzing shouldn't be changed by this pr, but it would help if you posted your configure line (and config log) as well as the output of make. See also doc/fuzzing
